dpm.container
Class HPG

java.lang.Object
  dpm.container.HPG

public class HPG
extends java.lang.Object

This was the first attempt at hierarchical peergroups. In JXTA there is not need to subclass peergroups, plus it is very difficult to do. JXTA is designed to discourage sub-classing of the standard peergroup implementations found in JXTA.
